name: Limited Minds
description:
Limited Minds is a short horror key hunter game done in 72 hours for the Mini gamejam. You cant exit the house before you have found all 3 keys.

(Funfact: Internet went down 2 hours before submission)

Known bugs:

  • Use 7zip to open the archive, if you get a error message with WinRar.
  • If you want to go upstairs again, you have to jump in the stair due to collision issues

How to play:

  • F: Turn on flashlight
  • E: Pick up items/Open doors


Music:

  • Main menu music composed by:  Martin "Mutant1988" Åsberg
  • Game music composed by: CO.AG
  • Scary girl sounds: Lara`s horror sounds YouTube channel
